1{-# OPTIONS_GHC -Wall #-}
2
3module Koshucode.Baala.Data.Type.Time.Date
4  ( -- * Data type
5    Date (..), MJDay, YmdTuple,
6    Year, Month, Week, Day,
7
8    -- * Construction
9    dateFromYmdAb, dateFromYwdAb, dateFromYdAb,
10
11    -- * Utility
12    dateDay, dateMapDay, dateAdd,
13    monthly, weekly, yearly,
14    mix02,
15  ) where
16
17import qualified Data.Time.Calendar                as T
18import qualified Data.Time.Calendar.WeekDate       as T
19import qualified Data.Time.Calendar.OrdinalDate    as T
20import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Base              as B
21import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Data.Type.Message as Msg
22
23
24-- ----------------------  Type
25
26data Date
27    = Monthly MJDay    -- ^ Date in /YYYY-MM-DD/
28    | Weekly  MJDay    -- ^ Date in /YYYY-#W-D/
29    | Yearly  MJDay    -- ^ Date in /YYYY-##D/
30      deriving (Show)
31
32instance Eq  Date where  a == b         = dateDay a == dateDay b
33instance Ord Date where  a `compare` b  = dateDay a `compare` dateDay b
34
35type MJDay    = T.Day     -- ^ The Modified Julian Day
36type Year     = Integer
37type Week     = Int
38type Month    = Int
39type Day      = Int
40
41type YmdTuple = (Year, Month, Day)
42
43
44-- ----------------------  Write
45
46instance B.MixEncode Date where
47    mixEncode = dateToMix
48
49dateToMix :: Date -> B.MixText
50dateToMix date =
51    case date of
52      Monthly d   -> dateMonth $ T.toGregorian    d
53      Weekly  d   -> dateWeek  $ T.toWeekDate     d
54      Yearly  d   -> dateYear  $ T.toOrdinalDate  d
55    where
56      dateMonth (y, m, d)  = B.mixDec y `hyMix`   mix02 m `hyMix` mix02 d
57      dateWeek  (y, w, d)  = B.mixDec y `hywMix`  B.mixDec w   `hyMix` B.mixDec d
58      dateYear  (y, d)     = B.mixDec y `hywwMix` B.mixDec d
59
60mix02 :: Int -> B.MixText
61mix02 = B.mixDecZero 2
62
63hyMix, hywMix, hywwMix :: B.Bin B.MixText
64hyMix    = B.mixInfix "-"
65hywMix   = B.mixInfix "-#"
66hywwMix  = B.mixInfix "-##"
67
68
69-- ----------------------  Construction
70
71-- | Create date from year, month, and day.
72dateFromYmdAb :: Year -> Month -> Day -> B.Ab Date
73dateFromYmdAb y m d =
74    case T.fromGregorianValid y m d of
75      Just day -> Right $ Monthly day
76      Nothing  -> Msg.notDate y m d
77
78-- | Create date from year, week, and day.
79dateFromYwdAb :: Year -> Week -> Day -> B.Ab Date
80dateFromYwdAb y w d =
81    case T.fromWeekDateValid y w d of
82      Just day -> Right $ Weekly day
83      Nothing  -> Msg.notDate y w d
84
85-- | Create date from year and day.
86dateFromYdAb :: Year -> Day -> B.Ab Date
87dateFromYdAb y d =
88    case T.fromOrdinalDateValid y d of
89      Just day -> Right $ Yearly day
90      Nothing  -> Msg.notDate y 0 d
91
92
93-- ----------------------  Utility
94
95-- | Get the internal Modified Julian Day.
96dateDay :: Date -> MJDay
97dateDay (Monthly day)  = day
98dateDay (Weekly  day)  = day
99dateDay (Yearly  day)  = day
100
101dateMapDay :: B.Map MJDay -> B.Map Date
102dateMapDay f (Monthly day)  = Monthly $ f day
103dateMapDay f (Weekly  day)  = Weekly  $ f day
104dateMapDay f (Yearly  day)  = Yearly  $ f day
105
106dateAdd :: (Integral n) => n -> B.Map Date
107dateAdd d = dateMapDay $ T.addDays (fromIntegral d)
108
109-- | Convert into monthly date.
110monthly :: B.Map Date
111monthly = Monthly . dateDay
112
113-- | Convert into weekly date.
114weekly :: B.Map Date
115weekly  = Weekly . dateDay
116
117-- | Convert into yearly date.
118yearly :: B.Map Date
119yearly  = Yearly . dateDay
120
